title: I am 26 years old. What are some tips for concentration for studying? - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: This is applicable to everyone, Here are some tips for everyone. Listen to music :-Many studies shows importance of listening of music improves your concentration. Following some music you can listen while studying. Any music with only beats improves your concentration. ChillSteps :- Interstellar Theme :- Chillsteps Spotify playlist :- ChillSteps, a playlist by Wai Phyo Tun on SpotifyNCS :- this one is my favourite NoCopyrightSounds2. Create story to remember things :- For example if you are learning a new subject & you want to remember theory. Divide that theory into multiple paragraphs. Create one simple story to remember things in that paragraphs to story you created. Similarly join those all story all together to remember whole paragraphs. Story could be any simple thing, Like you are walking in Garden, you saw a beautiful lake, then you saw beautiful lady siting next to you. She was playing with a kid & kid was 5 years old, he was playing with his guitar. It just an example, for every sentence you can correlate your study to a particular portion.  3. Take nap :- Once in while, like in 1 hour…… 10 minutes of nap, will improve your efficiency of brain. During nap try to remember the things you just studies. Just like a photo you taken on your phone, try to remember things you just now studies like a photo you taken through your eyes. Just closed your eyes & see the last one hour you study.  4. Curiosity :- This is main things for any study & concentration. Our brain is evolved, only because of curiosity we have. Just be curious about the things you are studying right now. Ask question to yourself like, Why the hell even I am studying ?, What’s the practical use of this ? Where do they used this ? How do you reach to this stage ? How ? why ? Where ? Whom ?. Once you created curiosity about that particular subject, then concentration doesn't even matter, because now you are not going to distract. We have a power of Internet, just used it.  5. Create Short notes. Create short notes like question paper, Try to collect as much previous year question paper or study material about that subject. Find out what type of questions will going to ask on exam. See the connections between question. Your short notes its like answer sheet to a question paper, Write in one simple line. Decorate your short notes, not too much, but with different color.  6. Delete social networking :- Everything is not perfect, social media has its own benefits & disadvantages. how you used it, that matters. We as human are social animal, We need each other, but in physical manner, We somehow dependent on each other, We need each others support. Meet people in physically, try to talk to them. You will be amazed, how beautiful this world is without likes & comments & mems. Our life cannot ne & never be portrait in single social media feed. This social media are design to & emphasize themselves to be addictive as much as possible. You will start comparing your life to other person. It may happen that you studying & another person is enjoying vacation on beach. Think about it for second.  These are some ways you can improve your concentration while studying, Just it one try, & let me know you that you can able to your concentration. In meanwhile you can follow these steps for better concentration. make a commitment for dedicated study hours in a day.make a schedule for a day and in this schedule keep study hours in early morning or night so that your hours will not be fluctuate due to whatsoever reason.Don’t keep mobile or if you want than use simple keypad mobile instead of smartphone.beauty sleep for a sufficient time like 6–7 hrs.say no to caffeine because it affects your memory and take water in seep to awake while studying.Go for a walk or do exercise in the morning fresh air.Listen soft music or classic music as music helps people calm down and focus betterPlay outdoor games like badminton or indoor like chase to keep you in habit of concentrating.Choose a peaceful atmosphere to study.You can choose a study partner who is serious for the studies and goal centered.Meditation and Yoga also a useful practice for better concentration.I hope my tips will help you and simultaneously others too who are in this age group and wants to get something in their life.
